channel.title: Azure AI Foundry Model Updates
channel.description: Latest updates on Azure AI Foundry models sold directly by Azure

item.title: gpt-5.2-codex
item.description: A GPT-5.2-series reasoning model optimized for coding workflows, including Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension. It supports both Chat Completions and Responses APIs with structured outputs, multimodal (text+image) processing, and advanced tool/function calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.2
item.description: A GPT-5.2-series reasoning model for general-purpose chat and responses scenarios. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal text+image input, and function/tool calling with parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.2-chat
item.description: A GPT-5.2 chat-focused model offered in Preview for Chat Completions and Responses APIs. It supports structured outputs and function/tool calling with parallel tool calls, and is intended for chat-style interactions rather than production use.

item.title: gpt-5.1
item.description: A GPT-5.1-series reasoning model for broad chat and responses use cases. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling with parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.1-chat
item.description: A GPT-5.1 chat model in Preview that includes built-in reasoning behavior. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, and function/tool calling; as a reasoning model it does not support parameters like temperature.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex
item.description: A GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model intended for coding and agentic tool use via the Responses API only. It supports structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling with parallel tool calls, and is optimized for Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model for coding workflows via the Responses API only. It supports structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling with parallel tool calls, and is optimized for Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex-max
item.description: A GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model variant for advanced coding and reasoning workflows via the Responses API only. It adds support for setting reasoning_effort to xhigh and does not support reasoning_effort=none, while retaining structured outputs, multimodal processing, and tool/function calling.

item.title: gpt-5
item.description: A GPT-5-series reasoning model for general-purpose use across Chat Completions and Responses APIs. It supports structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling with parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-5 reasoning model designed for cost/performance balance while retaining core GPT-5 capabilities. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling with parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5-nano
item.description: A compact GPT-5 reasoning model intended for efficiency-sensitive scenarios. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling with parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5-chat
item.description: A chat-focused GPT-5 model offered in Preview for Chat Completions and Responses APIs. The 2025-10-03 preview version adds enhanced emotional intelligence and mental health response capabilities for more nuanced, supportive interactions.

item.title: gpt-5-codex
item.description: A GPT-5 Codex-optimized model intended for coding workflows via the Responses API only. It supports structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling with parallel tool calls, and is optimized for Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension.

item.title: gpt-5-pro
item.description: A GPT-5 reasoning model variant designed for high-capability responses via the Responses API. It supports structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and function/tool calling.

item.title: gpt-oss-120b
item.description: An open-weight reasoning model in Preview for text-in/text-out scenarios. It supports Chat Completions API features such as streaming, function calling, and structured outputs, and is available for deployment (requires a Foundry project) and via managed compute.

item.title: gpt-oss-20b
item.description: A smaller open-weight reasoning model in Preview for text-in/text-out use cases. It supports Chat Completions API with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs, and is available via managed compute and Foundry Local.

item.title: gpt-4.1
item.description: A GPT-4.1-series multimodal model supporting text+image input and text output across Chat Completions and Responses APIs. It includes streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions), with a very large context window (up to ~1M tokens) but a noted issue with oversized tool/function definitions.

item.title: gpt-4.1-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-4.1-series multimodal model with text+image input and text output. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions), and shares the known issue around very large tool/function definitions.

item.title: gpt-4.1-nano
item.description: The smallest GPT-4.1-series multimodal model with text+image input and text output. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions), and is subject to the same known issue for extremely large tool/function definitions.

item.title: computer-use-preview
item.description: An experimental model trained for use with the Responses API computer use tool to enable mouse/keyboard control with screenshot context. It supports tools and streaming with text input/output and image input, and requires limited-access registration.

item.title: codex-mini
item.description: An o-series coding-focused model that is a fine-tuned version of o4-mini. It is designed for reasoning-heavy coding tasks via the Responses API, with structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and functions/tools support.

item.title: o3-pro
item.description: An advanced o-series reasoning model aimed at strong problem solving in domains like science, coding, and math. It supports the Responses API with structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and functions/tools support.

item.title: o4-mini
item.description: A newer o-series reasoning model offering enhanced reasoning abilities. It supports both Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and functions/tools support.

item.title: o3
item.description: A newer o-series reasoning model with enhanced reasoning abilities and strong performance in science, coding, and math. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal text+image processing, and functions/tools with parallel tool calling.

item.title: o3-mini
item.description: A smaller o-series reasoning model focused on text-only processing. It supports structured outputs and functions/tools, targeting efficient reasoning workloads.

item.title: o1
item.description: An o-series reasoning model with enhanced reasoning abilities and multimodal text+image processing. It supports structured outputs and functions/tools for problem-solving tasks.

item.title: o1-preview
item.description: An older preview version of the o1 reasoning model line. It is listed as available only to customers who were granted access as part of the original limited access.

item.title: o1-mini
item.description: A faster and more cost-efficient o1-series model, positioned as ideal for coding tasks requiring speed and lower resource use. Global Standard deployment is available by default, while standard (regional) deployments are limited to select customers from the o1-preview limited access release.

item.title: gpt-4o
item.description: A multimodal GPT-4o (Omni) model that integrates text and images in a single model to improve responsiveness and accuracy in human-computer interaction. It supports structured outputs, JSON mode, and parallel function calling, with strong non-English and vision performance compared to GPT-4 Turbo with Vision.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini
item.description: A fast, inexpensive multimodal model positioned as a capable replacement for GPT-3.5 Turbo series models. It supports text+image processing, JSON mode, and parallel function calling.

item.title: gpt-4 (turbo-2024-04-09)
item.description: GPT-4 Turbo with Vision is a generally available model used with the Chat Completions API. It replaces earlier GPT-4 preview vision models, though feature availability can vary by input method and deployment type.

item.title: text-embedding-3-large
item.description: The latest and most capable embedding model for converting text into vectors for similarity and retrieval. It supports a dimensions parameter to reduce embedding size for cost/performance control, and migration from older embedding models requires regenerating embeddings.

item.title: text-embedding-3-small
item.description: A third-generation embedding model that converts text into vectors for similarity and retrieval. It offers improved multilingual retrieval performance compared to older embeddings and supports reducing embedding dimensionality via a dimensions parameter.

item.title: text-embedding-ada-002
item.description: A legacy embedding model (with versioned variants) used to convert text into vectors for similarity and retrieval. The documentation notes you cannot upgrade between embedding models; moving to text-embedding-3-large requires generating new embeddings.

item.title: gpt-image-1
item.description: A GPT-image-1 series image generation model that creates images from text prompts and supports limited access preview. It is available in select Global Standard regions and requires registration/eligibility approval to deploy.

item.title: gpt-image-1-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-image-1 series image generation model in limited access preview. It generates images from text prompts and requires registration/eligibility approval, with Global Standard availability in select regions.

item.title: gpt-image-1.5
item.description: A GPT-image-1 series image generation model variant in limited access preview. It generates images from text prompts and requires registration/eligibility approval, with Global Standard availability in select regions.

item.title: dall-e-3
item.description: An image generation model that creates original images from natural language prompts. It is generally available for REST APIs, with DALL-E 3 via client SDKs listed as preview, and is available in specific regions (East US, Australia East, Sweden Central).

item.title: sora
item.description: An OpenAI video generation model that creates realistic and imaginative video scenes from text instructions. It is in preview and available in East US 2 and Sweden Central (Global Standard).

item.title: sora-2
item.description: A newer Sora video generation model for creating video scenes from text instructions. It is listed as NEW and available in preview in East US 2 and Sweden Central (Global Standard).

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-audio-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o-family audio model in preview for audio and text generation. It supports large token inputs and is intended for scenarios requiring audio generation alongside text.

item.title: gpt-4o-audio-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o-family audio model in preview for audio and text generation. It supports large token inputs and is part of the GPT-4o audio model family.

item.title: gpt-4o-realtime-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o-family audio model in preview designed for real-time audio processing. It supports low-latency interactions and is listed with multiple versions for realtime preview availability.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-realtime-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o mini-family audio model in preview designed for real-time audio processing. It supports low-latency audio interactions and is part of the GPT-4o audio model lineup.

item.title: gpt-realtime
item.description: A generally available (GA) audio model for real-time audio processing. It is listed alongside related realtime and audio variants and is intended for low-latency audio scenarios.

item.title: gpt-realtime-mini
item.description: A smaller real-time audio model variant for low-latency audio processing. It is listed with multiple versions, indicating ongoing updates to the realtime-mini line.

item.title: gpt-realtime-mini-2025-12-15
item.description: A specific versioned release of the gpt-realtime-mini model for real-time audio processing. It indicates a dated model version in the realtime-mini line for deployments requiring that version.

item.title: gpt-audio
item.description: An audio model listed for real-time audio processing use cases. It is part of the newer audio model lineup distinct from the GPT-4o audio preview models.

item.title: gpt-audio-mini
item.description: A smaller audio model variant for real-time audio processing. It is listed with multiple versions, indicating updates to the audio-mini line.

item.title: whisper
item.description: A general-purpose speech recognition model used for speech-to-text and speech translation via the /audio API. It supports audio file uploads up to 25 MB per request.

item.title: gpt-4o-transcribe
item.description: A speech-to-text model powered by GPT-4o, available via the /audio API. It supports audio files up to 25 MB and targets transcription workloads.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-transcribe
item.description: A speech-to-text model powered by GPT-4o mini, available via the /audio API. It supports audio files up to 25 MB and targets efficient transcription workloads.

item.title: gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize
item.description: A speech-to-text model that adds diarization/automatic speech recognition features. It supports audio files up to 25 MB and is intended for transcription scenarios requiring speaker-aware processing.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-transcribe-2025-12-15
item.description: A versioned GPT-4o mini speech-to-text model with improved transcription accuracy and robustness. It supports audio files up to 25 MB and represents an updated release of the mini transcribe line.

item.title: tts
item.description: A text-to-speech model (preview) optimized for speed via the /audio API. It converts text into spoken audio output for low-latency synthesis scenarios.

item.title: tts-hd
item.description: A text-to-speech model (preview) optimized for quality via the /audio API. It converts text into higher-fidelity spoken audio output.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-tts
item.description: A GPT-4o mini-powered text-to-speech model (preview) that supports style/tone guidance. It is intended for controllable voice generation from text via the /audio API.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-tts-2025-12-15
item.description: A versioned GPT-4o mini text-to-speech model (preview) that supports style/tone guidance. It represents a dated release for deployments requiring that specific version.

item.title: model-router
item.description: A Microsoft model that routes requests to underlying models based on the prompt and capabilities, supporting text and image input with variable max output tokens. It is available in Global Standard and Data Zone Standard in East US 2 and Sweden Central, with multiple versions (including 2025-11-18, 2025-08-07, and 2025-05-19).

item.title: o3-deep-research
item.description: A specialized o-series model variant intended for deep research workflows. It is currently only available with Foundry Agent Service, per the note in the model availability section.

item.title: FLUX.2-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs image generation and editing model supporting both text and image prompts, including multi-reference input (up to 8 images via API). It provides grounded outputs with flexible generation controls and is available as Global Standard in all regions via the BFL provider API.

item.title: FLUX.1-Kontext-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs in-context image generation and editing model designed for character consistency and advanced editing. It is available as Global Standard in all regions and can be used via Azure Image API endpoints and the BFL provider API (preview api-version).

item.title: FLUX-1.1-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs text-to-image model emphasizing fast inference, strong prompt adherence, competitive pricing, and scalable generation. It is available as Global Standard in all regions via the Azure Image API and the BFL provider API (preview api-version).

item.title: Cohere-rerank-v4.0-pro
item.description: A Cohere reranking/text-classification model for ordering documents by relevance. It returns JSON outputs, supports multiple languages, and is available in Global Standard across all regions, including via managed compute.

item.title: Cohere-rerank-v4.0-fast
item.description: A faster Cohere reranking/text-classification model for relevance ranking. It returns JSON outputs, supports multiple languages, and is available in Global Standard across all regions, including via managed compute.

item.title: Cohere-command-a
item.description: A Cohere chat-completion model optimized for reasoning, summarization, and question answering. It supports tool calling and can return text or JSON, with Global Standard availability in all regions.

item.title: embed-v-4-0
item.description: A Cohere embeddings model that can embed both text and images into vectors with selectable dimensions. It supports multiple languages and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.2-Speciale
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model that includes reasoning content and targets step-by-step reasoning tasks such as language, scientific reasoning, and coding. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and does not support tool calling.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.2
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model with reasoning content for reasoning-heavy tasks. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and does not support tool calling.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.1
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model with reasoning content and tool calling support. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and supports text/JSON response formats.

item.title: DeepSeek-R1-0528
item.description: A DeepSeek reasoning model (chat-completion with reasoning content) designed for long-context reasoning. It is available in both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed across all regions, and returns text outputs without tool calling.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3-0324
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model variant that supports tool calling and text/JSON outputs. It is available in Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-R1
item.description: A DeepSeek reasoning model (chat-completion with reasoning content) optimized for step-by-step reasoning tasks. It is available in Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed across all regions and returns text outputs without tool calling.

item.title: Llama-4-Maverick-17B-128E-Instruct-FP8
item.description: A Meta multimodal chat-completion model supporting text and image inputs with very large context limits. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and returns text outputs without tool calling.

item.title: Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct
item.description: A Meta chat-completion model for instruction following with a large context window. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and returns text outputs without tool calling.

item.title: MAI-DS-R1
item.description: A Microsoft reasoning model (chat-completion with reasoning content) supporting long-context inputs and outputs. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and returns text outputs without tool calling.

item.title: mistral-document-ai-2512
item.description: A Mistral Image-to-Text model for extracting text from images or PDF pages (up to 30 pages / 30MB). It returns text/JSON/Markdown and is available in Global Standard across all regions, with Data Zone Standard availability in US and EU.

item.title: mistral-document-ai-2505
item.description: A Mistral Image-to-Text model for extracting text from images or PDF pages (up to 30 pages / 30MB). It returns text/JSON/Markdown and is available in Global Standard across all regions, with Data Zone Standard availability in US and EU.

item.title: Mistral-Large-3
item.description: A Mistral multimodal chat-completion model supporting text and image inputs with tool calling. It is available as Global Standard in West US 3 and can return text or JSON outputs.

item.title: Kimi-K2.5
item.description: A Moonshot AI multimodal reasoning model (chat-completion with reasoning content) that accepts text and image input. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: Kimi-K2-Thinking
item.description: A Moonshot AI reasoning model (chat-completion with reasoning content) positioned as the latest and most capable open-source thinking model. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: grok-4
item.description: An xAI Grok chat-completion model designed for enterprise use cases such as extraction, coding, summarization, and agentic applications. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard across all regions, with registration required for access.

item.title: grok-4-fast-reasoning
item.description: An xAI Grok fast reasoning chat-completion model supporting text and image inputs and tool calling. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and also in Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: grok-4-fast-non-reasoning
item.description: An xAI Grok fast non-reasoning chat-completion model supporting text and image inputs and tool calling. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and also in Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: grok-code-fast-1
item.description: An xAI Grok coding-focused chat-completion model designed for coding and agentic applications. It supports tool calling, is available in Global Standard across all regions, and requires registration for access.

item.title: grok-3
item.description: An xAI Grok chat-completion model supporting tool calling and long-context text processing. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and also in Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: grok-3-mini
item.description: A smaller xAI Grok chat-completion model supporting tool calling and long-context text processing. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and also in Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: Ministral-3B (preview)
item.description: A Mistral model listed for fine-tuning in preview with limited details provided. It is marked as not supported for standard regions in the fine-tuning table, but available for global training (without data residency) in Foundry.

item.title: Qwen-32B (preview)
item.description: A Qwen model listed for fine-tuning in preview with an 8,000 token input and 32,000 token output limit. It is marked as not supported for standard regions in the fine-tuning table, but available for global training (without data residency) in Foundry.

item.title: gpt-35-turbo
item.description: A GPT-3.5 Turbo family model referenced in Assistants and provisioned deployment availability tables. It is available in multiple versions (for example 1106 and 0125) depending on region and deployment type.

item.title: gpt-35-turbo-16k
item.description: A GPT-3.5 Turbo variant with a larger context window referenced for Assistants availability. It is listed with version 0613 and is available only in certain regions for Assistants standard deployment.

item.title: gpt-4
item.description: A GPT-4 model family referenced for Assistants and provisioned deployment availability, including multiple versions (for example 0613, 1106-Preview, and 0125-Preview). These models are used with the Chat Completions API in the GPT-4/GPT-4 Turbo section context.

item.title: gpt-4-32k
item.description: A GPT-4 variant with an extended context window referenced in Assistants and provisioned deployment availability tables. It is listed with version 0613 and is available only in certain regions depending on deployment type.
